name: PoF Full Clear
description:
Get yourself a spot for your weekly <:pathoffire:1181643243931303966> **Path of Fire** clear. We will be doing the following wings:
<:wing5:1181643215812706315> **Hall of Chains** (W5)
<:wing6:1181643210955685988> **Mythwright Gambit** (W6)
<:wing7:1181643206308401243> **The Key of Ahdashim** (W7)

We may also attempt some CMs if time and mood permits!

I expect all DPS players to come prepared with both a power and condi DPS build.

<:quick_healer:1176639812900495400> <:alac_healer:1176639815282856017> **Healer Roles:**
- **Tank + G3**
  - Tank on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**.
  - Tank on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
  - Take `Green 3` on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
  - Take main tank on  <:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos**.
  - Take main tank on <:qadim:703930782649024573>  **Qadim**.
  - Tank on <:adina:703930780610461806> **Cardinal Adina**.
  - Tank on <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**.
- **Off-Tank + Push + Kite + Anomalies + G2**
  - Push on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**
  - Kite on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
  - Take `Green 2` on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**.
  - Tank one of the <:largos:703930782275731498> **Twin Largos**.
  - Tank a wyvern on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
  - Handle `Anomalies` on <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**.

<:quick_dps:1176639849156051014> <:alac_dps:1176639831720337438> **Boon DPS Roles:**
- **Tank @ SH**
  - Tank on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**.

<:dps:1176639819191951390> **DPS Roles:**
- **Epidemic**
  - Help kill `Tormented Dead` on a <:necromancer:675414199052140555> **Necro** build on <:soullesshorror:703930782841962557> **Soulless Horror**.
- **G1**
  - Take `Green 1` on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**
- **Boonstrip**
  - Bring a class that can negate boons on <:dhuum:703930782590304346> **Dhuum**, e.g. <:renegade:763700489195487236> **Renegade**.
- **Lamp**
  - Take the `Lamp` solo on <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
- **Kiter**
  - Bring a kiter build for <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**, e.g. <:deadeye:818854511342780416> **Rifle Deadeye**.
- **Pull**
  - Bring a <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** build with `Focus` for <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
- **Portal**
  - Bring a <:mesmer:675414199211393036> **Mesmer** or <:thief:675414199475634211> **Thief** build with `Portal` for <:qadim:703930782649024573> **Qadim**.
- **Pylon**
  - Come with a pylon kiting build for <:qadimthepeerless:703930782749818940> **Qadim the Peerless**, e.g. <:deadeye:818854511342780416> **Rifle Deadeye**.

Let me know if you have any questions!
templateOverview: A template for a <:pathoffire:1181643243931303966> **Path of Fire** full clear. The description mentions doing CMs if time/mood permits.
